001package io.cyborgcode.roa.api.allure;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.api.client.RestClientImpl;
004import io.qameta.allure.Allure;
005import io.restassured.response.Response;
006import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;
007
008/**
009 * Enhances {@link RestClientImpl} with Allure reporting capabilities.
010 *
011 * <p>This class logs API request and response details to Allure, attaching
012 * HTTP method, headers, body, response time, status codes, and other key
013 * request/response metadata.
014 *
015 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
016 */
017@Component
018public class RestClientAllureImpl extends RestClientImpl {
019
020   private static final String ATTACHMENT_HTTP_METHOD = "HTTP Method";
021   private static final String ATTACHMENT_URL = "URL";
022   private static final String ATTACHMENT_HEADERS = "Headers";
023   private static final String ATTACHMENT_REQUEST_BODY = "Request Body";
024   private static final String ATTACHMENT_RESPONSE_TIME = "Response Time (ms)";
025   private static final String ATTACHMENT_STATUS_CODE = "Status Code";
026   private static final String ATTACHMENT_RESPONSE_HEADERS = "Response Headers";
027   private static final String ATTACHMENT_RESPONSE_BODY = "Response Body";
028   private static final int MAX_BODY_LENGTH = 10_000;
029
030   /**
031    * Logs API request details and attaches them to Allure reports.
032    *
033    * @param methodName The HTTP method used for the request.
034    * @param finalUrl   The request URL.
035    * @param body       The request body, if applicable.
036    * @param headers    The request headers.
037    */
038   @Override
039   protected void printRequest(final String methodName, final String finalUrl, final String body,
040                               final String headers) {
041      super.printRequest(methodName, finalUrl, body, headers);
042      logRequestDetails(methodName, finalUrl, headers, body);
043   }
044
045   /**
046    * Logs API response details and attaches them to Allure reports.
047    *
048    * @param methodName The HTTP method used for the request.
049    * @param finalUrl   The request URL.
050    * @param response   The received response.
051    * @param duration   The time taken to execute the request in milliseconds.
052    */
053   @Override
054   protected void printResponse(final String methodName, final String finalUrl, final Response response,
055                                final long duration) {
056      super.printResponse(methodName, finalUrl, response, duration);
057      logResponseDetails(methodName, finalUrl, response, duration);
058   }
059
060   /**
061    * Logs request details as Allure attachments.
062    *
063    * @param methodName The HTTP method used.
064    * @param url        The request URL.
065    * @param headers    The request headers.
066    * @param body       The request body, if applicable.
067    */
068   private void logRequestDetails(String methodName, String url, String headers, String body) {
069      Allure.step(String.format("Sending request to endpoint %s-%s.", methodName, url), () -> {
070         addAttachmentIfPresent(ATTACHMENT_HTTP_METHOD, methodName);
071         addAttachmentIfPresent(ATTACHMENT_URL, url);
072         addQueryParamsAttachment(url);
073         addAttachmentIfPresent(ATTACHMENT_HEADERS, headers);
074         addAttachmentIfPresent(ATTACHMENT_REQUEST_BODY, body);
075      });
076   }
077
078   /**
079    * Logs response details as Allure attachments.
080    *
081    * @param methodName The HTTP method used.
082    * @param url        The request URL.
083    * @param response   The API response.
084    * @param duration   The execution time in milliseconds.
085    */
086   private void logResponseDetails(String methodName, String url, Response response, long duration) {
087      int statusCode = response.getStatusCode();
088      boolean isError = statusCode >= 400;
089
090      String stepTitle = isError
091            ? String.format("‚ùå Error Response: %d from %s-%s in %dms.", statusCode, methodName, url, duration)
092            : String.format("‚úÖ Response: %d from %s-%s in %dms.", statusCode, methodName, url, duration);
093
094      Allure.step(stepTitle, () -> {
095         addAttachmentIfPresent(ATTACHMENT_HTTP_METHOD, methodName);
096         addAttachmentIfPresent(ATTACHMENT_URL, url);
097         addAttachmentIfPresent(ATTACHMENT_RESPONSE_TIME, String.valueOf(duration));
098         addAttachmentIfPresent(ATTACHMENT_STATUS_CODE, String.valueOf(statusCode));
099
100         // Safely handle null headers
101         String headers = response.getHeaders() != null ? response.getHeaders().toString() : "";
102         addAttachmentIfPresent(ATTACHMENT_RESPONSE_HEADERS, headers);
103
104         // Safely handle null body
105         String body = "";
106         if (response.getBody() != null) {
107            body = response.getBody().prettyPrint();
108         }
109         addAttachmentIfPresent(ATTACHMENT_RESPONSE_BODY, body);
110      });
111   }
112
113   /**
114    * Adds an attachment to Allure if the content is not null or empty.
115    *
116    * @param name    The attachment name.
117    * @param content The attachment content.
118    */
119   private void addAttachmentIfPresent(String name, String content) {
120      if (content != null && !content.trim().isEmpty()) {
121         if (content.length() > MAX_BODY_LENGTH) {
122            content = content.substring(0, MAX_BODY_LENGTH) + "... (truncated)";
123         }
124         Allure.addAttachment(name, content);
125      }
126   }
127
128   private void addQueryParamsAttachment(String url) {
129      if (url.contains("?")) {
130         String queryParams = url.substring(url.indexOf("?") + 1);
131         addAttachmentIfPresent("Query Parameters", queryParams);
132      }
133   }
134
135}
